CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Location__c,'Ukraine') ,'Kyiv, Lviv, Ternopil' , IF( ISPICKVAL(Location__c, 'USA'), 'Chicago, Boston, New York' , IF( ISPICKVAL(Location__c, 'Belarus'), 'Minsk, Brest', IF( ISPICKVAL(Location__c, 'Poland '),'Wroclaw','Not defined!'))))
CustomField.label: Company offices
